item.title: Cloak 1.0.0 Alpha Released!
item.description: It’s been a long journey for my Elixir encryption library, Cloak, but we’re finally getting close to a full 1.0.0 release! Since I first published the library on Hex in 2015, both I myself and the community have added: Support for a wide variety of data types Local configuration through Vaults Stronger encryption with AES.GCM support A fully functional key rotation task, using cursors Guides and documentation A 200% performance increase!
